action.label: Kodkod Validation
action.tooltip: Choose a properties file and validate the current model.

action.label: Kodkod Configuration
action.tooltip: Create a configuration and validate the current model.

command.help: Validates the model using the model validator. A path to a configuration file can be specified. If no path is given, a generic configuration file will be created in the directory of the current USE specification.
command.label: KodkodValidateCmd

command.help: Checks if each OCL invariant is independent. An optionally given invariant name restricts the check to the corresponding invariant.
command.label: InvariantIndepCmd

command.help: Configures basic Kodkod properties. Possible parameters (case sensitive): 'satsolver:=[DefaultSAT4J|LightSAT4J|Lingeling|plingeling|MiniSat|MiniSatProver|ZChaffMincost|CryptoMiniSat]' selects the sat solver to be used (some solvers need to be installed manually); 'bitwidth:=i' sets the solver bitwidth; 'automaticDiagramExtraction:=[on|off]' determines if the current object diagram should be used as partial solution; 'save' saves the configuration
command.label: ConfigurationCmd

command.help: Resets the configuration and partial solutions.
command.label: ModelResetCmd

command.help: Paging of all solutions for a configured search space. Parameters: 'next' or 'previous' for the next or previous solution; 'show(i)' selects the ith solution.
command.label: KodkodScrollingValidateCmd

command.help: Similar to -scrolling, but collects (and counts) all available solutions in advance.
command.label: KodkodScrollingAllValidateCmd

command.help: Paging of all solutions for a configured search space. Parameters: 'next' or 'previous' for the next or previous solution; 'show(i)' selects the ith solution.
command.label: KodkodCTScrollingValidateCmd

command.help: Similar to -scrollingCT, but collects (and counts) all available solutions in advance.
command.label: KodkodCTScrollingAllValidateCmd

command.help: internal (OCL expressions are evaluated in the context of the relational solution.)
command.label: KodkodQueryCmd

command.help: Downloads and installs external solver libraries such as MiniSat and lingeling depending on the compatibilities with the system
command.label: SolverDownloadCmd
